SAFY: - Perfect protection when travelling through congested airports, bus terminals, malls, parks , and busy city streets.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THREE LAYERS OF PROTECTIVE FILTRATION 1. High efficiency droplets or particle proof. 2. Filter non oily particle. 3. Keep your face comfort and dry when breath in and out.

DISPOSABLE FACE MASKS Safe And Breathable, Particle Proof, High Filtration. Material: PP non-woven fabric, Melt blown non- woven. Package: 50 Pcs masks. Manufactured for and Marketed By : Cheers Devices.
WHY DO WE CHOOSE CHEERS DEVICES？

ACTUAL DETAILS Need attention The mask is not suitable for use in anoxic environment when the oxygen concentration is below 19.5%.It is not suitable to use this mask when the concentration of pollutants is too high to be harmfulto life or health.This mask shall not be used to protect against harmful gases or vapors.Replace maskwhen found contaminated, damaged or with increased suction resistance.It is highly recommended to change disposable face mask every four hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Grade Thick Durable
reviews.reviewText: Since I have never ordered a mask before, it is difficult to tell the quality of the export mask through the photos and the seller's description, and see if I get these at this price. But because of the special period now, I ordered these masks. When I got these masks, I found that they were not fragile and of good quality. They are packed in plastic packaging inside the mask box, and there are two layers of packaging, which makes me feel that these masks are very safe. They also came earlier than expected. My order arrived within 4 working days. Considering that there are so many people ordering now, the speed of the order is indeed very fast. They are comfortable and light. I decided to order another box. If you need masks, you can order it, please don't hesitate!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, but not large
reviews.reviewText: These masks are exactly what you want from a disposable: 3-ply, thick, breathable, metal at nose bridge for fit. But if you've used other disposables in the past, do be aware that these masks are slightly on the small side -- about 6.75" wide x 4" tall before wearing. Should fit fine if you are petite or average, but for a large face these won't fit/cover very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Disposable Mask and Value for the Money
reviews.reviewText: The price is quite good. I got 100 for $26 and free shipping. Plus it arrived within two days after I ordered it, unlike a previous order a while ago from a different vendor which took about a month to deliver.They are somewhat basic and being disposable don't feel quite as protective as reusable ones, but protection is more about fit and how porous the material is and whether there is a second layer. These have three layers. Plus it has a bendable metal nose clip to ensure a snug fit around the nose, which they don't mention in the description, but is important.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2020
reviews.reviewText: These masks are perfect for when you don’t want to use a cloth mask. They’re lightweight, comfortable, and fit nicely! They come in a pack of 50 and are at a great price point. I definitely recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality with comfortable fit
reviews.reviewText: These are great for my sons. We keep a few stashed in the car, string bags, etc. They are worn one time then tossed. Don’t have to worry about losing them. Seem to be holding up well. Comfortable fit and good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too large for narrow faces
reviews.reviewText: If you have a narrow face and are a petite person, the masks will be too large. The ear loops are stretchier than other masks I've ordered. However, the mask itself is durable and seems to serve its purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I like these masks as I can breath in them, and they are thick enough that the light does not show through when held to the light. The only down side is the elastic that goes around the ear is a too long to get a snug fit for my face. However, I just tied a knot in each end of the elastic to shorten the length a bit and the mask fits more snugly now without impacting the ability to breathe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2020
reviews.reviewText: If I still need masks, I will repurchase the seller’s products without hesitation. There is nothing to be discerning about the quality of the mask. Importantly, they have independent packaging. Every ten plastic sealed bags. This is a superb design. I can pack them in my backpack without worrying about them getting dirty. They are worth 10 stars!
